lead_paragraph: A Texas woman who fell from a chairlift at a small Colorado ski resort last week died from a rupture of the aorta and other traumatic injuries, an autopsy has concluded.
snippet: A Texas woman who fell from a chairlift at a small Colorado ski resort last week died from a rupture of the aorta and other traumatic injuries, an autopsy has concluded....

headline.main: Cause of Death Released in Fall at Colorado Ski Resort
headline.print_headline: Cause of Death Released in Fall at Colorado Ski Resort
